headline: Kroger (KR): Valuing Its Shares After Bold Digital Delivery Moves and Freshgiving Bundle Rollout
summary: Kroger (KR) just rolled out some major moves this season, announcing the expansion of its digital delivery footprint through new Instacart and Uber Eats partnerships, in addition to an affordable 2025 Freshgiving meal bundle. Both efforts highlight how Kroger is leaning into convenience and value as holiday demand ramps up. See our latest analysis for Kroger. Riding a wave of new partnerships and customer-focused initiatives, Kroger’s share price has held up well this year, closing at $64.91...
